com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.attack

Class CreeperChemistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.attack.AbstractSpecialAttack
      • com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.attack.CreeperChemistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public final class CreeperChemistry
extends AbstractSpecialAttack
    Creeper Chemistry. Upon explosion, a creeper launches creeper reinforcements in all directions. Those reinforcements will immediately explode upon landing, releasing an AreaEffectCloud.

      • checkConditions

        protected boolean checkConditions(org.bukkit.event.Event event)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSpecialAttack
        An abstract method to be implemented when a new AbstractSpecialAttack is created. Offers more customizability than the standard AbstractSpecialAttack.checkEligibility(Event) method.
        Specified by:
        checkConditions in class AbstractSpecialAttack
        Parameters:
        event - the event.
        Returns:
        true if the event can cause this attack to occur.

      • doAttack

        void doAttack(org.bukkit.event.Event event)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSpecialAttack
        A method to implement all of the logic behind the attack, i.e. dealing damage, summoning entities, etc. The Event parameter is included in order to facilitate access to relevant information, i.e. the entity/entities involved.
        Specified by:
        doAttack in class AbstractSpecialAttack
        Parameters:
        event - the event which triggered the attack.
